title: (x) heavy sans w/ rounded corners on "Breathless" DVD cover - (similar to) Aurora Cond {Nick Curtis}
content:
[http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/2128/brless2ja8.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093744/http:/img521.imageshack.us/img521/2128/brless2ja8.jpg)

Anyone? The closest match I came across was [Ultramagnetic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093744/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0020) by YouWorkForThem.  
Here's the DVD cover from which I took the sample, if it's to any help: [Clicky](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093744/http:/criterion.com/content/images/full_boxshot/408_box_348x490.jpg)

Thanks in advance!
author: Pico

comments.content: It appears to be a variant (perhaps simply with a rounded stroke) of [Aurora Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093744/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/aurora/bold-condensed/)...
